about_the_game:
Descend into the abyss where light fades and terror awakens. In Deep Depths, you are a solitary researcher stationed at the bottom of the ocean, surrounded by the crushing darkness of the deep sea. Your only companions are the hum of your equipment and the haunting stillness of the blackened waters outside your lab.

One fateful night, a violent tremor jolts you awake. The lab's alarms blare, filling the claustrophobic halls with an ominous sense of dread. With your heart pounding, you rush to the dig site in your trusty sub, only to discover something terrifying has been unearthed. Racing back to the lab, you quickly realize you are no longer as alone as you once thought.

Key Features
    [Immersive Atmosphere: Experience the crushing isolation and eerie stillness of the deep sea, brought to life with stunning visuals and sound design.]
    [Tense Exploration: Pilot your sub through treacherous underwater landscapes, and uncover the secrets hidden in the dark.]
    [Survival Horror: Outmaneuver an unseen terror that stalks you through the broken remains of your lab. You are alone, and it’s hunting you.]
    [Gripping Story: A short, narrative-driven experience that plunges you into a high-stakes battle for survival.]

name: Deep Depths
short_description: Dive deep into terror in Deep Depths, an immersive survival horror set in the pitch-black depths of the ocean. As a lone researcher, explore the eerie remains of your lab and outwit the lurking terror that hunts you.
